data.title: International Institute for the Brain
data.text:
We are excited to announce that iBRAIN is expanding to the Washington, DC Metro area and we are currently evaluating potential students as well as hiring full-time staff.

We put together a comprehensive brochure outlining the services iBRAIN will be delivering to students who have significant disabilities (i.e., physical and/or communication), some of whom are non-verbal/non-ambulatory (wheelchair-dependent), and are within a 90-minute drive to downtown Washington, DC (see brochure here).

If you would like to have your child assessed for free, please fill out this online form (iBRAIN Enrollment Inquiry Form) or call 646-315-1548 and someone will call you back to make arrangements.

If you want to get a sense of the current iBRAIN program in New York City, please follow our Instagram page (iBRAIN Instagram).
